data.question: What is the Langmuir surface area of Cu(cyhdc) calculated at 77 K?
At what temperature does the NH3 desorption from Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc) occur in two steps?
What is the maximum NH3 uptake capacity of Cu(cyhdc) at 298 K and 1 bar?
Does Cu(cyhdc) adsorb more NH3 or N2 at 298 K?
data.answer: Cu(cyhdc) adsorbs more NH3 than N2 at 298 K.

data.question: What is the estimated stabilization energy provided by the hydrogen bonding network in Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc)?
Can Cu(cyhdc) be regenerated directly from Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc)?
data.answer: Yes, Cu(cyhdc) can be regenerated directly from Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc).

data.question: What is the isosteric heat of adsorption for the transformation of Cu(cyhdc) to Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc)?
Is the NH3 adsorption in Cu(cyhdc) at high temperatures and pressures reversible?
data.answer: Yes, NH3 adsorption in Cu(cyhdc) at high temperatures and pressures is partially reversible.

data.question: What happens to Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc) when exposed to ambient atmosphere?
data.answer: It changes color from blue to purple and transforms into a new crystalline phase.

data.question: What is the working capacity of Cu(cyhdc) with a modest pressure swing at 423 K?
Does Cu(cyhdc) undergo a phase change upon NH3 adsorption?
data.answer: Yes, Cu(cyhdc) undergoes a phase change upon NH3 adsorption.

data.question: What is the threshold pressure for NH3 adsorption in Cu(cyhdc) at 298 K?
Is Cu(cyhdc) stable in the presence of water vapor?
data.answer: Yes, Cu(cyhdc) is stable in the presence of water vapor.

data.question: What is the effect of humidity on NH3 adsorption in Cu(cyhdc)?
data.answer: Humidity leads to the formation of a new crystalline phase distinct from Cu(NH3)4(cyhdc) when exposed for 20 minutes.

data.question: Can Cu(cyhdc) selectively adsorb NH3 over N2 and H2 at high temperatures?
data.answer: Yes, Cu(cyhdc) can selectively adsorb NH3 over N2 and H2 at high temperatures.

data.question: What is the color change observed in Cu(cyhdc) upon NH3 adsorption?
What is the estimated time to reach half capacity for NH3 adsorption in Cu(cyhdc) at 298 K and 1 bar?
Is the NH3 adsorption mechanism in Cu(cyhdc) at room temperature the same as at high temperatures and pressures?
data.answer: No, the NH3 adsorption mechanism in Cu(cyhdc) at room temperature is different from that at high temperatures and pressures.

data.question: What is the volume expansion associated with the framework-to-polymer transition triggered by NH3 uptake in Cu(cyhdc)?
Can Cu(cyhdc) be handled under ambient conditions without degradation?
data.answer: Yes, Cu(cyhdc) can be handled under ambient conditions without immediate degradation.
